tech_news.title: AirPods’ best features come to Android and Linux with free app - The Verge
tech_news.description: The best features of Apple’s AirPods come to Android and Linux with the free LibrePods app, including ear detection and customizing transparency mode.

tech_news.title: ChatGPT Atlas adds Arc-like vertical tabs - The Verge
tech_news.description: OpenAI is rolling out an update for its ChatGPT Atlas AI-powered browser that adds Arc-like vertical tabs and the ability to set Google as your default search engine.

tech_news.title: Google releases Nano Banana Pro, its latest image generation model - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Google is upgrading its image generation model with new editing chops, higher resolutions, more accurate text rendering, and the ability to search the web.

tech_news.title: iOS 26.2 is coming: Here are my three favorite new features - 9to5Mac
tech_news.description: iOS 26.2 is launching next month, but I’ve been using the update in beta already. Here are my three favorite new iOS 26.2 features so far.

tech_news.title: Silent Hill 2's brilliant remake surprise-launches on Xbox Series X/S with a massive discount ahead of tonight's showcase - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Last year's stupendous Silent Hill 2 remake is finally available on Xbox Series X/S.

tech_news.title: I’m officially done with YouTube Kids - The Verge
tech_news.description: There are some good videos on YouTube Kids, but the proliferation of low-quality entertainment makes it hard to stomach.

tech_news.title: Jaw-Dropping $1.5 Trillion Lithium Find in an Unlikely U.S. Location - plusnews.org
tech_news.description: A seismic find in a quiet corner of the West A team of geologists has confirmed a vast lithium deposit straddling the Oregon–Nevada border, an unlikely landscape of volcanic plains and ranchlands. Valued at roughly $1.5 trillion, the resource could reshape Am…

tech_news.title: Camera support could be the boost Matter needs - The Verge
tech_news.description: From encrypted video streaming to new energy tools and garage door controls, this major update could finally make Matter useful for more than lights and smart plugs.
